General.Name: Arlitech Electronic
General.Description: Arlitech Electronic Corp. supplies inductors for LCD panel industry in Taiwan. It offers high current power, SMD power, DIP power, and RF inductors, as well as EMI suppression filters. The company also provides business items; material development; thermal solutions designs; and heat sink manufacturing. Its products are used in the display panel, network, industrial, consumer electronics, computing intelligence, and automotive electronics. Arlitech Electronic Corp. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 646, Chung Hsing Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
